step_feedback.feedback: Good job bringing your arms in front of your chest and tightening your muscles. Keep your fists closed for this step.
Excellent work opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
You're doing great with the outward arm movement and muscle relaxation. Focus on a smooth exhale.
Good job maintaining shoulder height with your arm extension. Continue to relax your muscles as you exhale.
You're performing the exercise well. Ensure your wrists remain open and relaxed during the outward movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight when bringing your arms in and relax as you extend them outwards. This helps with lymph drainage.
